title: Government plans to extend the 55pc pension tax trap
text: Iâ€™ll make sure the pension freedoms work Government plans to extend the 55pc pension tax trap Gold-plated 'final-salary' pensions could be subject to a lower lifetime limit, which would see savers pay more tax at 55pc MPs could soon have the shine taken off their gold-plated benefits Photo: PA
